Translations.Text: Iya-china
jnanagarbha kora'anara sapata
niscaya tumi raachulasakalara antarbhukta
sarala pathara oparata pratisthita
E'i kora'ana prabala paraakramasali, parama dayalu allahara taraphara paraa aratirna
Yate tumi satarka karaiba paraa enekuraa eta jatika yisakalara pitr-purausasakalaka satarka karaa horaa na'i, seye sihamta udasina
Arasye sihamtara adhikansara oparata (allahara) bani aradharaita haiche, seye sihamta imana posana nakaraiba
Niscaya ami sihamtara dinita thumtarai laike galabandha (sikali) meraiya'i dicho, phalata sihamta urd'dhamukhi hai gaiche
Arau ami sihamtara agaphale praacira arau pichaphale praacira sthapana karaicho, tara pichata ami sihamtaka dhaki dicho, phalata sihamte dekhibalai napaya
Tumi sihamtaka satarka karaa ba nakaraa, sihamtara babe ubhaye samana; sihamte imana posana nakaraiba
Tumi kerala take'i satarka karaiba paraiba yiye kora'anara anusarana karae arau rahamanaka nedekhakaiye bhaya karae. Eteke tumi taka ksama arau sanmanajanaka puraskarara susambada diya
Niscaya amiye'i mrtaka jiraita karao arau likhi raakho yi sihamte agalai praerana karae arau yi sihamte pichata erai yaya. Ami pratyeka bastuke'i suspasta kitapata samraksana karai raakhicho
Sihamtara ocarata barnana karaa eta janapadara adhibasisakalara drstanta; yetiya sihamtara ocarata raachulasakala ahichila

Yetiya ami sihamtara ocarata praerana karaichilo dujana raachula, tetiya sihamte te'omlokaka abisbasa karaichila, tara pichata ami te'omlokaka trtiya ejanara dbaraa saktisali karaichilo. Te'omloke kaichila, ‘niscaya ami tomalokara ocarata praeraita haicho’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘tomaloke dekhuna amara darae'i manuha, parama karaunamaye eko aratirna karaa na'i. Tomaloke kerala micha kathahe kaicha’
Te'omloke ka’le, ‘amara pratipalake jane, niscaya ami tomalokara ocarata praeraita haicho’
‘Arau spastabharae pracara karaatohe amara dayitba’

Sihamte ka’le, ‘niscaya ami tomalokaka amangalara karana hicapehe ganya karao, yadi tomaloke birata nohoraa tente arasye ami tomalokaka sila daliya'i hatya karaima arau amara phalara paraa tomalokaka yantranadayaka sastiye sparsa karaiba’
Te'omloke ka’le, ‘tomalokara amangala tomalokarae'i lagata; tomalokaka upadesa diya haiche buliye'i enekai kaicha neki? Baram tomaloka eta simalanghanakarai sampradaya’
Arau nagarara durararti praantara paraa ejana byakti daurai ahi ka’le, ‘he mora sampradaya! Tomaloke raachulasakalara anusarana karaa
‘anusarana karaa te'omlokara yisakale tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarae arau te'omloka satpathapraapta
‘Arau mora ki yukti ache ye, ma'i te'omra ibadata nakaraima, yijane moka srsti karaiche? Arau yara ocarata tomalokaka ubhata'i niya ha’ba
‘Ma'i te'omra bahirae ana kono ilaha grahana karaima neki? Rahamane mora kono ksati karaiba bicaraile sihamtara chuparaicha mora kono kamata nahiba arau sihamte moka ud'dharao karaiba noraaraiba
‘Ene karaile niscaya ma'i spasta bibhraantita patita hama
‘Niscaya ma'i tomalokara pratipalakara oparata imana anicho, eteke tomaloke mora katha suna’
Te'omka koraa ha’la, ‘jannatata praraesa karaa’. Te'om ka’le, ‘haya! Mora sampradaye yadi janilehemtena
‘yara binimayata mora pratipalake moka ksama karai diche arau moka sanmanita karaiche’
Ami te'omra (mrtyura) pichata te'omra sampradayara biraud'dhe akasara paraa kono bahini praerana karaa na'i arau seya praerana karaara kono prayojano nachila
Seya achila kerala eta bikata sabda. Phalata sihamta nithara nistabda hai ga’la
Paraitapa bandasakalara babe; sihamtara ocarata yetiya'i kono raachula ahiche tetiya sihamte te'omra lagata thatta-bidraupa karaiche
Sihamte laksya karaa na'ine ye, ami sihamtara purbe bahu prajanmaka dhbansa karaicho? Niscaya sihamta sihamtara ocarata ubhati nahiba
Sihamta sakaloke ekatraita karai amara ocarata upasthita karaoraa ha’ba
Arau mrta bhumi sihamtara babe eta nidarsana, yaka ami sanjiraita karaicho arau tara paraa sasya utpanna karaicho, yibora sihamte khaya
Arau tata ami srsti karaicho khejura arau anurara udyana arau tata ami prabahita karaicho kichumana prasrarana
yate sihamte tara phalamula khaba parae, athaca sihamte nija haterae srsti karaa na'i. Tathapi'o sihamte krtajnata prakasa nakaraibane

paraitra arau mahana te'om, yijane sakaloke yora yorakai srsti karaiche, matira paraa utpanna udbhide'i ha'omka ba sihamtara nija prajatirae'i ha'omka (narai arau purausa) arau se'ibora bastura majato yiboraka sihamte najane
Arau raati'o sihamtara babe eta nidarsana, ami tara paraa dinaka apasaraita karao, tetiya sihamta andhakaraacchanna hai parae
Arau surya'i bhramana karae tara nirdista gantabyara phale, e'ito mahaparaakramasali, sarbajna (allaha)ra nirdharana
Arau candrara babe ami nirdista karaicho bibhinna manajila, arasesata se'ito sukana beka, purani khejura thanira akarata ubhati yaya
Suryara pakse sambhara nahaya candraka laga poraa, arau raatira pakse sambhara nahaya dinaka atikrama karaa, arau pratyeke'i nija nija kaksapathata samturai ache
Sihamtara babe arau eta nidarsana haiche e'i ye, ami sihamtara bansadharabilakaka boja'i nauyanata araohana karaichilo
arau sihamtara babe'o anuraupa yanabahana srsti karaicho yate sihamte araohana karae
Arau ami iccha karaile sihamtaka duba'i maraiba parao, tetiya sihamtara kono ud'dharakarai nathakiba arau sihamte paraitraano napaba
ekamatra amara karauna'ihe sihamtaka para laga'i diye arau kichu samayara babe upabhogara suyoga diya haya
Arau yetiya sihamtaka koraa haya, ‘tomalokara sanmukhata yi ache arau tomalokara pichata yi ache se'i samparke takbaraa aralambana karaa; yate tomalokara prati rahamata karaa haya’
arau yetiya'i sihamtara pratipalakara nidarsanasamuhara majara paraa kono nidarsana sihamtara ocarata ahe, tetiya'i sihamte tara paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya

Arau yetiya sihamtaka koraa haya, ‘allahe tomalokaka yi jiraika dana karaiche tara paraa tomaloke byaya karaa’, tetiya kaphirasakale muminasakalaka kaya, ‘ami taka khadya dana karaimane, yaka allahe iccha karaile'i khoraaba parae? Niscaya tomaloka spasta bibhraantita acha’
Sihamte kaya, ‘tomaloke yadi satyabadi horaa tente koraa, e'i pratisrauti ketiya purna ha’ba’
sihamta mathona eta bikata sabdara apeksata ache, yitorae sihamtaka baka-bitandata lipta thaka arasthata akramana karaiba
Tetiya sihamte achiyata karaarao samartha napaba arau nijara paraiyalabargara ocaralaike'o ubhati ahiba noraaraiba
Arau yetiya sinata phum diya ha’ba, tetiya'i sihamte kabarara paraa ola'i nija pratipalakara pine daurai guci ahiba
Sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara! Kone amaka amara nidraasthalara paraa uthale? Dayamaya allahe iyarae'i pratisrauti dichila arau raachulasakale'o satyahe kaichila’
E'ito ha’ba kerala eta bikata sabda; tetiya'i ihamta sakaloke upasthita karaa ha’ba amara sanmukhata
eteke aji karao prati an'yaya karaa nahaba arau tomaloke yi karaichila kerala tarae'i pratiphala diya ha’ba
Niscaya jannatabasisakala aji anandata magna thakiba
te'omloke arau te'omlokara straisakala susitala chamra talata susajjita asanata a'uji bahiba
Tata thakiba te'omlokara babe phalamula, arau te'omloke yito bicaraiba se'itorae'i paba
asima dayalu pratipalakara taraphara paraa koraa ha’ba ‘chalama’ (abhinandana ba niraapatta)
Arau ‘he aparaadhisakala! Tomaloke aji prthaka hai yoraa’
He adama santana! Ma'i tomalokaka e'i marme nirdesa diya nachilone ye, tomaloke cayatanara ibadata nakaraiba, karana si tomalokara prakasya satrau
arau kerala morae'i ibadata karaa, e'itorae'i sarala patha
Arau cayatane tomalokara bahu dalaka bibhraanta karaichila, tathapi'o tomaloke anudharana karaa na'ine
e'itorae'i se'i jahannama, yara pratisrauti tomalokaka diya haichila
Tomaloke ye kupharai karaichila tara babe aji tomaloke iyata dagdha horaa
Aji ami sihamtara mukhata mohara marai dima, sihamtara hate amara lagata katha patiba arau sihamtara bharaiye saksya diba sihamtara krtakarmara
Arau ami iccha karaile arasye sihamtara cakuboraka lopa karai dilohemtena, tetiya sihamte patha anbesanata dauraile'o (kono kamata nahiba) karana kenekaino dekha paba
arau ami iccha karaile sihamtara nija nija sthanata sihamtara akrti paraibartana karai dilohemtena, phalata sihamte aguraa'iyo yaba noraarailehemtena arau ubhati'o ahiba noraarailehemtena
Arau ami yaka dirgha jirana dana karao, srsti arayabata tara aranati ghata'om. Tathapi'o sihamte buji napayane
ami te'omka (raachulaka) kabya racana karaa sikoraa na'i arau e'ito te'omra babe sobhaniya'o nahaya. Niscaya e'ito kerala eta upadesa arau suspasta kora'ana
yate i jiraitasakalaka satarka karaiba parae arau kaphirasakalara biraud'dhe sastira katha satya buli pramanita haya
Sihamte laksya karaa na'ine ye, amara haterae prastuta karaa bastusamuhara majata ami sihamtara babe gharaciya jantu'o srsti karaicho. Sihamte'i se'iborara malika
Arau ami se'iboraka sihamtara basibhuta karai dicho. Phalata se'iborara kichu sankhyaka haiche sihamtara bahana arau kichumanaka sihamte bhaksana karae
Arau sihamtara babe e'iborara majata ache bahuto upakara lagate ache paniya upadana. Tathapi'o sihamte krtajnata prakasa nakaraibane
athaca sihamte allahara paraibarte an'ya ilaha grahana karaiche, e'i asata ye, sihamte sahayyapraapta ha’ba
Kintu se'iborae sihamtaka sahaya karaibalai saksama nahaya, baram se'iboraka sihamtara biraud'dhe bahiniraupe upasthita karaa ha’ba
Eteke sihamtara kathaya yena tomaka cintita nakarae, niscaya ami jano yi sihamte gopana karae arau yi sihamte prakasa karae
Manuhe laksya karaa na'ine ye, ami taka srsti karaicho sukrabindura paraa, athaca pichata si prakasya bitandakarai hai parae
Arau si amara bisaye upama racana karae, athaca si nijara srstira katha paharai yaya. Si kaya, ‘asthira bhitarata kone praana sancara karaiba yetiya i jahi-khahi, geli-paci yaba’
koraa, ‘teraemi tata praana sancara karaiba yijane iyaka prathamabara srsti karaiche, arau te'om pratito srsti samparke samyaka paraijnata’
Teraemi tomalokara babe se'ujiya gachara paraa ju'i utpanna karae, phalata tomaloke tara paraa agni prajbalita karaa
Yijane akasasamuha arau prthirai srsti karaiche te'om sihamtara anuraupa akau srsti karaibalai saksama nahayane? Niscaya haya. Te'om mahasrasta, sarbajna
Te'omra bisayato enekuraa ye, te'om yetiya kono bastura iccha karae, tetiya kerala kaya, ‘ha’, phalata se'ito hai yaya
Eteke paraitra arau mahana se'i satta, yara hatata pratyeka bisayara sarbabhauma kartrtba; arau te'omra ocarate'i tomaloka pratyarartita ha’ba
